P-4 P408 Nissan Skyline GT-R (R34) 2002 JGTC Series GT500 Class 19th Place M. Kageyama/É. Comas




Masami Kageyama & Érik Comas drove the #23 Castrol Pitwork Nissan Skyline for the Nismo team in the 2002 JGTC Series. The overall red & sliver color scheme is the same as the sister #22 Xanavi car with some differences in sponsor logos. The car seen here is the 2.6L RB26-powered version used for the first half of the season. Mid-way through the season the engine was changed to the new, more powerful 3.0L VQ30 engine. Kageyama & Comas had better results in the first half of the season with 4th & 6th place finishes in rounds 3 & 2 respectively. They finished the season in 19th place in the GT500 class.
